subject: Economy
question_en: What is the total Gross Domestic Product (GDP) of Rajasthan in 2020?
question_hi: राजस्थान के 2020 में क्या सर्वोत्र ग्रॉस्ड डोमेन प्रेमोबॉल (GDP) है?
explanation_en: As per the official data, the total GDP of Rajasthan in 2020 was Rs. 90,000 crore. (Source: National Statistical Commission).
